title: Refunds
body: Well, I am a bit confused about refunds. I refuned 3 unknown champions like 4 years ago, and I bought an ultimate skin by mistake and i want to refund it, any thoughts of what i could do?{{champion:99}} {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: If you bought that ultimate skin by accident *recently* and it *hasn't been used*, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to take care of that for ya.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cIqnrjdA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-16T02:38:52.953+0000)
>
> If you bought that ultimate skin by accident *recently* and it *hasn't been used*, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to take care of that for ya.


sorry, i used the skin because it was '' fresh '' [ elementalist lux ] but i got dissapointed. And also i cant get a ticket because my email is not verified, and its on an unknown email. :c
